level.heading: Chapter not exclusive.
level.text: This chapter shall not preclude an organization from being merged under law other than this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 706 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
